title: Dad and son team up against entitled man who preemptively stops their gas from pumping, leaves him stranded at the gas station: ‘My [17-year-old] son… pulled out a keychain'
description: Grade A parenting doesn't have to be learned from a book or class—it doesn't even have to be passed down from generation to generation. If can simply come from showing your character in the heat of the moment. True, that can go either way, but sometimes it can be epic. Take, for example, this beautiful father and son bonding moment. It blossomed out of a situation sparked by some entitled dude at a gas station. He pulled up behind them in a big 'ole truck and decided they were taking too long pumping their gas. So while the son was inside getting snacks and the dad was cleaning the windows as the gas was pumping, this entitled guy puffed out his chest and took the gas pump right out of their car!
author: Elna McHilderson
excerpt: Dad and son team up against entitled man who preemptively stops their gas from pumping, leaves him stranded at the gas station: ‘My [17-year-old] son… pulled out a keychain' - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.
text: This guy was ready to square up about it and as the dad confronted him, debating if it was worth a fist fight, the son came back and said it wasn't worth it. The dad agreed with his son, and they just drove off. As they were driving away, however, the son showed his dad a shinning keychain of keys. It turns out, while that entitled guy was being a Karen, the other guy's son snuck into his truck and took the keys right out of the ignition. They drove off and that guy's karma was never seeing those keys again!
